title: Tutorial #1: Watch and Learn
description: This is just a tutorial level. That funny shape is called a glider. Click play to see what happnes!

title: Tutorial #2: Now you Try
description: Try to draw the same shape that you saw before, and get that blue dot (goal) to activate!

title: Tutorial #3: Build more Gliders!
description: Oh no! Something is in the way! Try to kill it! If you can build a barrage of gliders, that might work.

title: First Real Mission
description: The rules which control the Game of Life world are very very simple, and yet you can build some powerful chain reactions using it.
